Error.Message: Operation completed successfully.
The operation failed due to an internal error.
Error.PossibleCauses: The operation failed due to an internal error.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. If the issue persists, contact support.

Error.Message: The operation failed due to an internal error.
Error.PossibleCauses: The operation failed due to an internal error.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. If the issue persists, contact support.

Error.Message: Process Server installation couldn't be found on the appliance.
Error.PossibleCauses: 1. Process Server is not installed 2. Process Server's registry key (HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Azure Site Recovery Process Server) is missing.
Error.RecommendedAction: 1. Install the Process Server, if not already done. 2. Ensure the registry key (HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Azure Site Recovery Process Server) is intact and valid. For further help, contact support.

Error.Message: Process Server is expected to be installed in %ExpectedCSMode; mode but found to be installed in an unexpected mode %InstalledCSMode;.
Error.PossibleCauses: Process Server is installed in an unexpected mode.
Error.RecommendedAction: Uninstall the Process Server. Install it back in the expected mode %ExpectedCSMode;.

Error.Message: Replication data port cannot be zero.
Error.PossibleCauses: The replication data port passed as a configurator parameter is unset or zero.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation by passing a non-zero port number.

Error.Message: Process Server is already first time configured.
Error.PossibleCauses: Process Server is already first time configured.
Error.RecommendedAction: 1. Since Process Server is already in the expected state, the invalid operation performed at the current state is blocked. Verify if the action is indeed valid. 2. Unconfigure the process server

Error.Message: Process Server is not yet first time configured.
Error.PossibleCauses: Process Server is not yet first time configured.
Error.RecommendedAction: 1. The operation is expected to be executed after the Process Server is configured. Verify if the sequence of operations performed is indeed valid. 2. First-time configure the Process Server.

Error.Message: Cache location input cannot be empty.
Error.PossibleCauses: Cache location input to the configurator is empty.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation by passing a non-empty absolute path for the Cache location.

Error.Message: Cache location input %InvalidCacheLocation; cannot be a relative path.
Error.PossibleCauses: Cache location input is a relative path.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation by passing a non-empty absolute path for the Cache location.

Error.Message: Replication log folder path is already configured for the Process Server - %AlreadyConfiguredFolderPath;.
Error.PossibleCauses: A previous unclean configurator action could've caused this.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation after unconfiguring the Process Server.

Error.Message: Replication log folder is already existing in the Process Server - %ExistingFolderPath;.
Error.PossibleCauses: A previous unclean configurator action could've caused this.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation after deleting the %ExistingFolderPath; folder.

Error.Message: Telemetry folder path is already configured for the Process Server - %AlreadyConfiguredFolderPath;.
Error.PossibleCauses: A previous unclean configurator action could've caused this.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation after unconfiguring the Process Server.

Error.Message: Telemetry folder is already existing in the Process Server - %ExistingFolderPath;.
Error.PossibleCauses: A previous unclean configurator action could've caused this.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation after deleting the %ExistingFolderPath; folder.

Error.Message: Default request folder path is already configured for the Process Server - %AlreadyConfiguredFolderPath;.
Error.PossibleCauses: A previous unclean configurator action could've caused this.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation after unconfiguring the Process Server.

Error.Message: Default request folder is already existing in the Process Server - %ExistingFolderPath;.
Error.PossibleCauses: A previous unclean configurator action could've caused this.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation after deleting the %ExistingFolderPath; folder.

Error.Message: Generating certificates for Process Server's HTTPS listener failed with exit code %ReturnValue;.
Error.PossibleCauses: The operation failed due to an internal error.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. If the issue persists, contact support.

Error.Message: Process Server is expected to be registered with Rcm.
Error.PossibleCauses: Process Server is not registered with Rcm.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation after registering the Process Server with Rcm.

Error.Message: Process Server is expected to be unregistered.
Error.PossibleCauses: Process Server is still registered with Rcm.
Error.RecommendedAction: 1. Retry the operation after unregistering the Process Server with Rcm. 2. In case of unconfigure, retry by passing -force to bypass this check.

Error.Message: Process Server installation is corrupted.
Error.PossibleCauses: Values in Process Server's registry key (HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Azure Site Recovery Process Server) are invalid.
Error.RecommendedAction: Ensure the registry key (HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Azure Site Recovery Process Server) and its values are intact and valid. For further help, contact support.

Error.Message: Failed to Register or Modify the Process Server with Rcm.
Error.PossibleCauses: The operation failed due to an internal error.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. If the issue persists, contact support.

Error.Message: Failed to Test the connection of the Process Server with Rcm.
Error.PossibleCauses: The operation failed due to an internal error.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. If the issue persists, contact support.

Error.Message: Failed to Unregister the Process Server with Rcm.
Error.PossibleCauses: The operation failed due to an internal error.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. If the issue persists, contact support.

Error.Message: Failed to create the folder %FolderPath;.
Error.PossibleCauses: Folder creation could've failed due to permission issue or an existing item in the given path.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. Manually try deleting the folder %FolderPath;, if present and then retry. If the issue persists, contact support.

Error.Message: Failed to delete the folder %FolderPath;.
Error.PossibleCauses: Folder creation could've failed due to permission issue or an item in use error.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. Manually try deleting the folder %FolderPath;, if present and then retry. If the issue persists, contact support.

Error.Message: Replication data port %InvalidPort; is in use by another process %ProcessName;.
Error.PossibleCauses: The replication data port passed as a configurator parameter is in use by another process.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation by passing an unused port number.

Error.Message: The operation could not be completed because there is no outbound connectivity to the internet.
Error.PossibleCauses: The replication appliance does not have any connectivity to the internet.
Error.RecommendedAction: 1. Make sure that you are connected to the internet. 2. If there are any firewall rules, then ensure that they are configured to allow communication with Azure Site recovery services.

Error.Message: The operation could not be completed because there is no outbound connectivity to the internet.
Error.PossibleCauses: The replication appliance does not have any connectivity to the internet or DNS resolution is not working correctly.
Error.RecommendedAction: 1. Make sure that you are connected to the internet. 2. If there are any firewall rules, then ensure that they are configured to allow communication with Azure Site recovery services. 3. Ensure that your DNS resolution is working as expected.

Error.Message: The operation could not be completed because there is no outbound connectivity to the proxy server.
Error.PossibleCauses: The replication appliance does not have any connectivity to the proxy server or DNS resolution is not working correctly.
Error.RecommendedAction: 1. Make sure that you can connect to the proxy server. 2. If there are any firewall rules, then ensure that they are configured to allow communication with Azure Site recovery services. 3. Ensure that your DNS resolution is working as expected.

Error.Message: The operation could not be completed because there is no outbound connectivity to the internet.
Error.PossibleCauses: The proxy server prohibits connection to Azure.
Error.RecommendedAction: 1. Proxy server prohibits connection to Azure. Ensure proxy server to allow communication with Azure Site recovery services.

Error.Message: The appliance configuration could not be performed successfully.
Error.PossibleCauses: The process server fingerprint file is not accessible.
Error.RecommendedAction: Navigate to the file "ps.fingerprint" located at "%PsFingerPrintFilePath" and ensure that you can access it. If not, then change the permissions of the file. Once done, retry the operation.

Error.Message: The operation failed due to an internal error.
Error.PossibleCauses: The operation failed due to an internal error.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. If the issue persists, contact support.

Error.Message: The operation failed due to FQDN resolution error.
Error.PossibleCauses: The operation failed due to FQDN resolution error.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. If the issue persists, contact support.

Error.Message: Unable to start %Services; on ProcessServer
Error.PossibleCauses: Navigate to services.msc and ensure that the service(s) %Services; are not disabled and set to automatic start mode.
Error.RecommendedAction: Retry the operation. If the issue persists, contact support.
